column4: hey folks i got problems trying tp play openarena in intrepid with a laptop w i945 driver, the display after 5 seconds come "bluiry", can anybody point me to the right direction?
i don't know, how can I find out? it just says it is already installed
type that on terminal whereis vmplayer
then its not installed, i guess yet
then how come sudo apt-get install vmware-player says it is the most recent version?
how do I unpack a RPM?
vmplayer there is no such package, yoyu mean mplayer?
